Package stincmale.ratmex.meter

Class AtomikLongArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • stincmale.ratmex.meter.AtomikLongArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LongArray

    @ThreadSafe
public final class AtomikLongArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements LongArray
    This concurrent implementation of LongArray is just a wrapper over an AtomicLongArray. It is named AtomikLongArray with 'k' in order to avoid a name clash.
